visionOS 2.0+

```
static func createBookmark(
    id: StateBookmarkIdentifier,
    context: UInt64 = 0
) -> Self
```

Available when `Self` is `CreateBookmarkAction`.## [See Also](/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopAction/createBookmark(id:context:)#see-also)
